name: Hexed (itch) (Honest_Eyes)
description:
People are vanishing and monsters are appearing more often. 
It's time to find out why!
At least that was your plan but you fell victim yourself and are now on a quest to both cure yourself and find the mysterious figure inflicting these curses!

Hexed is a short game you can download for Windows, Linux and Mac.
Initially I made it so I could show maps to a friend for them to use as they like but I liked the example story so much I just had to make it a full fledged title.

This is not for children as it contains themes of extreme violence, strong language and distressing situations.

The game is expected to take 3 to 5 hours for you to complete depending on your play style and difficulty.
